Mapping from MeasureImprovementNotation to (not specified)

ACTIVE. Published on 2021-02-18 by Clinical Quality Information WG (http://www.hl7.org/Special/com...).

The mapping of FHIR improvement notation codes to the corresponding HL7 V3 code used in HQMF for each of the improvement notations


Group 1Mapping from MeasureImprovementNotation to ObservationValue

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
increase (Increased score indicates improvement)is equivalent toIncrIsImp (Increased score indicates improvement)
decrease (Decreased score indicates improvement)is equivalent toDecrIsImp (Decreased score indicates improvement)

name: ImprovementNotationMapping
title: Improvement Notation Mapping
description: The mapping of FHIR improvement notation codes to the corresponding HL7 V3 code used in HQMF for each of the improvement notations
